summary: Completed e2e testing of FLUX-DNA Neural Sanctuary app. Backend APIs working correctly (13/14 tests passed). Frontend loads and routes work properly. One missing endpoint identified.

minor.issue: Endpoint not implemented - frontend API client expects it but backend doesn't have it

integration_issues.issue: Frontend flux-api.ts has getStrategicBriefing() method but backend endpoint doesn't exist

action_items: Add /api/founder/strategic-briefing endpoint to backend/api/founder.py to match frontend API client
FounderCockpit.tsx uses hardcoded password 'phoenix2024' instead of backend API - consider integrating with backend auth
critical_code_review_comments: FounderCockpit.tsx uses hardcoded password 'phoenix2024' while backend uses 'PhoenixSovereign2026!' - inconsistent auth
Frontend flux-api.ts references /api/founder/strategic-briefing and /api/founder/send-ai-pulse endpoints that don't exist in backend
seed_data_creation: None - tests use dynamic session creation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs all working. Frontend Vite app runs on port 3000 from /app directory (not /app/frontend). Supervisor config was fixed. Missing /api/founder/strategic-briefing endpoint needs to be added.

backend: OSINT check returns risk_score and risk_level
Assessment start returns session_id and neural_directive
Assessment message with normal flow works
Assessment message with distress keywords triggers sanctuary mode
Founder metrics with valid password works
Founder metrics with invalid password returns 401
High OSINT risk enables cloak mode
frontend: Landing page loads with 'Begin Your Ascension' button
Auth page shows login form with email/password inputs
Founder ops page loads with password gate
